title: Why Elon Musk picked Linda Yaccarino to lead Twitter as CEO
description: Twitter has struggled to generate revenue since Musk took over as CEO, as advertisers have fretted over its sweeping rollbacks of content moderation.

title: Google AI is coming whether you like it or not. Here’s what to watch.
description: Google's new AI search might be a Band-Aid on a structural problem: The internet is a bad place to get good answers.

title: Who is Linda Yaccarino, Elon Musk’s reported pick for Twitter CEO?
description: The NBCUniversal executive is reportedly in advanced talks with Musk, who has said he will step down to become executive chair and chief technology officer.
